title: How to Automate a Product Hunt Launch - Lessons from Helicone's Success
title1: How to Automate a Product Hunt Launch
title2: How to Automate a Product Hunt Launch
description: Learn how to become Product of the Day on Product Hunt through automation. Discover key strategies for automating user emails, social media content, and DM campaigns, based on Helicone's experience becoming Product of the Day.
author: Cole Gottdank
